member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXDVA
member.summary: The ENUMLOGFONTEXDV structure contains the information used to create a font.

member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXDVA.elfEnumLogfontEx
member.summary: An structure that contains information about the logical attributes of the font.

member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXDVA.elfDesignVector
member.summary: A structure. This is zero-filled unless the font described is a multiple master OpenType font.
